---
title: Package Downloads
author: Daniel Turek
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
output: html_document
---

\   

```{r }
library(cranlogs)

pkgs <- c('nimble',
          'nimbleSCR',
          'nimbleSMC',
          'basicMCMCplots',
          'BayesNSGP',
          'MATA')

from <- '2018-01-01'

downloads <- cran_downloads(pkgs, from = from, to = Sys.Date())

for(p in pkgs)
    plot(count ~ date,
         data = downloads[downloads$package==p,],
         type = 'l', main = p, xlab = 'Date', ylab = 'Downloads')
```
